info.description:
Shown in Memphis Leather in Tan.

OVERVIEW
Here is the new look in leather. Sleek and smart, the Tribeca two-seat sofa is tailored in on-trend Lucia leather, making it ideal for any home where space and style are important.

Support is assured with steel springs in the bench seat platform and the broad track arms, and minimal panelling of the leather promotes an expensive look despite the value-for-money price tag. Standing on die-cast aluminium legs and having plump fillers in gusseted seat cushions and stacked back cushions, which can be unzipped to allow for rejuvenation, this expansive sofa is one of many cool newcomers to Freedom.

Tribeca is also available as a modular, which has as its key design feature an extra wide terminal for additional seating.
 
“The Tribeca is one of a new tribe of Freedom sofas delivering style at an incredible price.”Freedom sofa buyer.
info.name: Tribeca LAF Mod 2.5S + RAF Terminal
